page.title: 07ATTITUDES OF PENNARD FARMERS
page.content: SOME FARMERS THINK THAT IT IS EASIER NOW THAN WHEN THEY FIRST STARTED FARMING. OTHERS DO NOT. WITH ALL THE NEW EQUIPMENT AND MACHINERY YOU WOULD THINK THAT IT IS EASIER NOW. MOST FARMERS PREFER NOT TO HAVE THEIR LAND USED FOR ANY OTHER PURPOSE APART FROM FARMING, E.G. CAMPING, CARAVANNING OR SHOWS. SOME FARMERS WOULD LIKE MORE LAND THAN THEY ALREADY HAVE BUT SOME PREFER THE NUMBER OF ACRES THEY ALREADY HAVE. ALL FARMERS IN THE AREA OF PENNARD HAVE GOT CHILDREN, AND THEY WOULD LIKE THEIR CHILDREN TO CARRY ON THEIR FARM IF THE CHILDREN WANTED TO. NONE OF THE FARMS IN THE PENNARD AREA DO BED AND BREAKFAST FOR TOURISTS. MOST FARMERS THINK THAT MOST TOURISTS ARE FRIENDLY, BUT SOME DAMAGE PROPERTY OF THE FARMER.
